users.bio: CEO of Event Vision, leading luxury wedding and corporate event planning company in Riyadh. Specializes in royal events and high-profile celebrations with 12+ years experience.
Managing Director of RMC Events & Marketing, premier event management company serving government entities and Fortune 500 companies. Expert in large-scale conferences and exhibitions.
CEO of LuxuryKSA, leading event management company specializing in concept development, creative direction, and brand management across the Kingdom.
Founder of Eventfull, 6+ years experience with 350+ successful projects. Specializes in tech-driven brand experiences and corporate events.
Managing Director of Aplus Events, complete event solutions provider with full media production capabilities. Expert in luxury weddings and corporate celebrations.
Regional Director of Blink Experience, 21+ years international experience. Managed KSA National Day Fireworks (Guinness World Record 2018) and FEI World Cup Finals 2024.
Senior Event Director at Hafray, top-tier corporate events and exhibitions specialist. Expert in AV production, lighting, and comprehensive event support.
Co-founder of Amkenah Marketing & Events (Est. 2014), 40+ years combined team experience. Aligned with Saudi Vision 2030 initiatives.
Creative Director at Eventana (Est. 2007), integrated event management and brand activation specialist with innovative approach to experiential marketing.
Regional Manager at Time Entertainment, established presence with international outlook. Specializes in entertainment management and cultural events.
Senior Event Manager at Diamond Al Sadeem (DASCO, Est. 2008), professional corporate events and tradeshow organizing specialist.
Operations Director at Miraj Media Riyadh office, multi-location agency with presence in Saudi Arabia, Dubai, and Bahrain. Expert in regional event coordination.
Executive chef and catering director at Four Seasons Riyadh with over 15 years of luxury hospitality experience. Specializes in customized menus with Saudi chefs for off-site events.
Master chef specializing in fine dining experiences with client-centric approach. Expert in quality ingredients and customized menu development for luxury events.
Established catering specialist serving oil & gas companies, government sector, and royal events. Known for professional service and advance booking recommendations.
Award-winning documentary photographer based in Saudi Arabia, featured internationally. Specializes in artistic and creative wedding photography capturing all cultures and ethnicities.
Female-led editorial photography team featured in Vogue and The Wed. Specializes in luxury ballroom weddings with fashion-inspired storytelling approach.
Regional director for Scarlett Entertainment's Saudi operations. Expert in booking local KSA-based talent and creating custom entertainment productions for corporate and private events.
Entertainment coordinator specializing in traditional Arabic musicians and modern entertainment. Covers corporate events, weddings, and private parties across Riyadh and Jeddah.
Master florist with expertise in luxury flower arrangements for weddings and corporate events. Known for artistic designs and reliable same-day delivery service throughout Riyadh.
Expert florist and event coordinator specializing in full wedding production and bespoke celebrations. Combines floral design with comprehensive event management services.
Founder of White Events, boutique event planning agency specializing in destination weddings and luxury private events. Featured in Saudi Vogue and Harper's Bazaar Arabia.
Creative Director of Elegant Touch Events, award-winning event design and production company. Known for innovative tech integration and sustainable event practices in the Kingdom.
Principal of Royal Ceremonies, exclusive event planning for VIP clientele and diplomatic functions. 15+ years managing state dinners, royal receptions, and international summits.
Executive Producer at Signature Events Arabia, specializing in entertainment industry events, product launches, and celebrity galas. Managed events for Saudi Entertainment Authority and major brands.
CEO of Haraakah Sports Events Management, located in Faisaliah Tower, Olaya District. Specializes in premium sports events management and athletic competitions across the Kingdom.
Regional Director at DMG Events LLC in Al Olaya. International exhibitions and events specialist with global portfolio. Expert in trade shows, conferences, and large-scale business events.
Senior Wedding Planner at Cerimonia Wedding & Events, Olaya District branch. 8+ years experience in luxury Saudi weddings and cultural celebrations. Featured in Saudi Vogue Arabia.
Event Coordinator at Al Faisaliah Hotel Events Division. Manages high-profile corporate events and government functions in the prestigious Kingdom Centre, Olaya District.
Founder of Olaya Events, boutique event planning agency based in Olaya Business District. Specializes in corporate meetings, product launches, and executive conferences for Fortune 500 companies.
Executive Event Director at Kingdom Tower Events Management. Manages exclusive events in the iconic Kingdom Centre, Olaya. Expert in VIP receptions, diplomatic functions, and royal ceremonies.
Creative Director of Tahlia Events, located at the intersection of Tahlia Street and Olaya. Award-winning designer for luxury weddings and high-end social gatherings with international clientele.
Senior Coordinator at Olaya Corporate Events, serving the business district since 2018. Manages international conferences, board meetings, and executive retreats for multinational corporations.
Full-service photography and video production specialist. Covers corporate events, conferences, and lifestyle photography with professional equipment and flexible rescheduling policy.

Regional Director at DMG Events LLC in Al Olaya. International exhibitions and events specialist with global portfolio. Expert in trade shows, conferences, and large-scale business events.
Senior Wedding Planner at Cerimonia Wedding & Events, Olaya District branch. 8+ years experience in luxury Saudi weddings and cultural celebrations. Featured in Saudi Vogue Arabia.
Event Coordinator at Al Faisaliah Hotel Events Division. Manages high-profile corporate events and government functions in the prestigious Kingdom Centre, Olaya District.
Founder of Olaya Events, boutique event planning agency based in Olaya Business District. Specializes in corporate meetings, product launches, and executive conferences for Fortune 500 companies.
Executive Event Director at Kingdom Tower Events Management. Manages exclusive events in the iconic Kingdom Centre, Olaya. Expert in VIP receptions, diplomatic functions, and royal ceremonies.

organizers.businessDescription: Premium luxury event planning in KSA

events.title: Middle East Healthcare Innovation Summit
events.titleAr: قمة الابتكار في الرعاية الصحية في الشرق الأوسط
events.description: Advancing healthcare technology and medical research in the GCC region. Featuring leading physicians, researchers, and healthcare technology companies.
events.descriptionAr: تقدم تكنولوجيا الرعاية الصحية والبحوث الطبية في منطقة دول مجلس التعاون الخليجي. يضم أطباء رائدين وباحثين وشركات تكنولوجيا الرعاية الصحية.

events.title: Traditional Saudi Handicrafts Exhibition
events.description: Discover authentic Saudi craftsmanship including traditional textiles, pottery, jewelry, and woodwork. Meet master craftsmen and learn ancient techniques.
events.descriptionAr: اكتشف الحرفية السعودية الأصيلة بما في ذلك المنسوجات التقليدية والفخار والمجوهرات والأعمال الخشبية. التق بالحرفيين المهرة وتعلم التقنيات العريقة.

events.title: Arabian Music & Arts Festival
events.description: Celebrate Middle Eastern culture through music, poetry, and visual arts. Features traditional oud performances, contemporary Saudi artists, and cultural workshops.
events.descriptionAr: احتفل بالثقافة الشرق أوسطية من خلال الموسيقى والشعر والفنون البصرية. يشمل عروض العود التقليدية والفنانين السعوديين المعاصرين وورش العمل الثقافية.

events.title: Global Trade & Investment Conference
events.description: Connect with international investors and explore trade opportunities in Saudi Arabia. Focus on manufacturing, logistics, and cross-border commerce.
events.descriptionAr: تواصل مع المستثمرين الدوليين واستكشف الفرص التجارية في السعودية. التركيز على التصنيع واللوجستيات والتجارة عبر الحدود.

events.title: Riyadh Tech Innovation Conference 2025
events.description: Discover the latest in artificial intelligence, fintech, and smart city solutions. Network with tech leaders, startups, and investors shaping Saudi Arabia's digital transformation.
events.descriptionAr: اكتشف الأحدث في الذكاء الاصطناعي والتكنولوجيا المالية وحلول المدن الذكية. تواصل مع قادة التكنولوجيا والشركات الناشئة والمستثمرين الذين يقودون التحول الرقمي في السعودية.
events.venue: Four Seasons Hotel Riyadh - Kingdom Ballroom

events.title: Riyadh Corporate Wellness Conference
events.description: Promoting workplace wellness, mental health awareness, and employee wellbeing strategies. Features wellness experts, corporate leaders, and health professionals.
events.descriptionAr: تعزيز العافية في أماكن العمل والوعي بالصحة النفسية واستراتيجيات رفاهية الموظفين. يضم خبراء العافية وقادة الشركات ومتخصصي الصحة.

events.title: Saudi Green Energy Expo
events.description: Showcasing renewable energy solutions, solar technology, and sustainability initiatives. Supporting Saudi Arabia's commitment to environmental leadership.
events.descriptionAr: عرض حلول الطاقة المتجددة وتكنولوجيا الطاقة الشمسية ومبادرات الاستدامة. دعم التزام السعودية بالريادة البيئية.
events.venue: Al Faisaliah Hotel - Prince Sultan's Grand Hall

events.title: Saudi Women's Leadership Summit
events.description: Celebrating women's achievements in business, technology, and society. Inspiring stories, networking opportunities, and professional development workshops.
events.descriptionAr: الاحتفال بإنجازات المرأة في الأعمال والتكنولوجيا والمجتمع. قصص ملهمة وفرص للتواصل وورش عمل للتطوير المهني.
events.venue: Four Seasons Hotel Riyadh - Kingdom Ballroom

events.title: Arabian Luxury Wedding Expo
events.description: The Kingdom's most prestigious wedding exhibition featuring luxury venues, designers, and service providers. Perfect for couples planning their dream wedding with authentic Saudi traditions and modern elegance.
events.descriptionAr: أرقى معرض للأفراح في المملكة يضم أماكن الإقامة الفاخرة والمصممين ومقدمي الخدمات. مثالي للأزواج الذين يخططون لحفل زفاف أحلامهم بالتقاليد السعودية الأصيلة والأناقة الحديثة.
events.venue: Al Faisaliah Hotel - Prince Sultan's Grand Hall

events.title: Riyadh International Food Festival
events.description: Taste the world in Riyadh! Featuring authentic cuisines from over 30 countries, cooking demonstrations by celebrity chefs, and traditional Saudi dishes.
events.descriptionAr: استمتع بأطعمة العالم في الرياض! يضم أطباقاً أصيلة من أكثر من 30 دولة، عروض طبخ من طهاة مشاهير، والأطباق السعودية التقليدية.

events.title: Saudi Vision 2030 Business Summit
events.description: Join leading business executives, entrepreneurs, and government officials as we explore opportunities in Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030 transformation. This premium summit will cover key sectors including NEOM, tourism, entertainment, and renewable energy initiatives.
events.descriptionAr: انضم إلى كبار رجال الأعمال والمتخصصين وممثلي الحكومة لاستكشاف الفرص في تحول رؤية السعودية 2030. ستغطي هذه القمة المميزة القطاعات الرئيسية بما في ذلك نيوم والسياحة والترفيه ومبادرات الطاقة المتجددة.

events.title: Riyadh Startup Pitch Competition
events.titleAr: مسابقة عرض الشركات الناشئة في الرياض
events.description: Watch promising Saudi startups compete for funding and mentorship opportunities. Featuring venture capitalists, angel investors, and successful entrepreneurs.
events.descriptionAr: شاهد الشركات الناشئة السعودية الواعدة تتنافس للحصول على التمويل وفرص الإرشاد. يضم أصحاب رؤوس الأموال الاستثمارية والمستثمرين الملائكيين ورجال الأعمال الناجحين.

events.title: Saudi National Day Celebration Gala
events.description: Celebrate the Kingdom's heritage with an evening of traditional performances, cultural exhibitions, and fireworks. Honoring Saudi Arabia's rich history and bright future.
events.descriptionAr: احتفل بتراث المملكة في أمسية من العروض التقليدية والمعارض الثقافية والألعاب النارية. تكريماً للتاريخ الثري والمستقبل المشرق للسعودية.

events.title: Saudi Youth Leadership Forum
events.description: Empowering the next generation of Saudi leaders through workshops, mentorship, and networking opportunities. Aligned with Vision 2030's focus on youth development.
events.descriptionAr: تمكين الجيل القادم من القادة السعوديين من خلال ورش العمل والإرشاد وفرص التواصل. متماشياً مع تركيز رؤية 2030 على تنمية الشباب.

events.title: Riyadh Gaming & Esports Championship
events.description: The Kingdom's premier gaming tournament featuring popular games, professional teams, and substantial prize pools. Part of Saudi Arabia's growing esports ecosystem.
events.descriptionAr: بطولة الألعاب الرائدة في المملكة تضم ألعابًا شائعة وفرق محترفة وجوائز مالية كبيرة. جزء من النظام البيئي المتنامي للرياضات الإلكترونية في السعودية.

venues.name: Al Faisaliah Hotel - Prince Sultan's Grand Hall
venues.nameAr: فندق الفيصلية - قاعة الأمير سلطان الكبرى

venues.name: Four Seasons Hotel Riyadh - Kingdom Ballroom
venues.nameAr: فندق فور سيزونز الرياض - قاعة المملكة

venues.name: Hyatt Regency Riyadh Olaya - Main Ballroom
venues.nameAr: فندق حياة ريجنسي الرياض العليا - القاعة الرئيسية

venues.name: Mandarin Oriental Al Faisaliah - Al Rimal Ballroom
venues.nameAr: فندق ماندارين أورينتال الفيصلية - قاعة الرمال

venues.name: Courtyard by Marriott Riyadh Olaya
venues.nameAr: كورت يارد من ماريوت الرياض العليا

venues.name: The Ritz-Carlton Jeddah
venues.location: King Fahad Fountain, Prince Sultan Road
venues.description: Luxury palace hotel with French-inspired gardens, offering two main ballrooms that can host 1,000+ guests each with Red Sea views
venues.descriptionAr: فندق فخم يطل على نافورة الملك فهد مع حدائق فرنسية وقاعتين رئيسيتين تتسع لأكثر من 1000 ضيف

venues.name: Narcissus Hotel & Spa Riyadh - Al Rimal Ballroom
venues.nameAr: فندق وسبا نرجس الرياض - قاعة الرمال

venues.name: InterContinental Jeddah
venues.description: Luxury hotel on the Corniche with 13 venues accommodating up to 1,150 guests, featuring Al Sultan Ballroom with Red Sea views
venues.descriptionAr: فندق فخم على الكورنيش مع 13 مكاناً يتسع لـ 1150 ضيف مع قاعة السلطان المطلة على البحر الأحمر

venues.name: Park Hyatt Jeddah Marina Club & Spa
venues.description: Luxury marina hotel with Lazurde Conventions Centre featuring over 2,500 sq meters of event space and 800 sq meter ballroom
venues.descriptionAr: فندق مارينا فخم مع مركز لازوردي للمؤتمرات بمساحة أكثر من 2500 متر مربع وقاعة رقص 800 متر مربع

venues.name: Hilton Jeddah Hotel
venues.description: Award-winning MICE facilities with 55,434 sq ft of event space for up to 3,500 guests, featuring Hilton Hall and Al Qasr Ballroom
venues.descriptionAr: مرافق حائزة على جوائز مع 55434 قدم مربع من مساحة الأحداث لما يصل إلى 3500 ضيف

venues.name: Sheraton Jeddah Hotel
venues.description: Premium hotel with 7 distinctive event spaces accommodating up to 1,000 guests including private-access ballroom
venues.descriptionAr: فندق فاخر مع 7 مساحات مميزة للأحداث تتسع لما يصل إلى 1000 ضيف

venues.name: Al Malekat Palace Hall
venues.description: Royal-style wedding hall with luxurious crystal chandeliers and elegant decor, perfect for grand celebrations
venues.descriptionAr: قاعة أفراح بطراز ملكي مع ثريات كريستالية فاخرة وديكور أنيق، مثالية للاحتفالات الكبيرة

venues.name: Al Embratora Hall
venues.description: Ultra-glamorous wedding venue fit for royalty with luxurious crystal chandeliers, sculptured ceilings, and modern sound system
venues.descriptionAr: قاعة أفراح فائقة الفخامة تليق بالملوك مع ثريات كريستالية فاخرة وأسقف منحوتة ونظام صوتي حديث

venues.name: Leylaty Wedding Hall
venues.description: Unique and elegant wedding hall with fancy chandeliers and sophisticated decor, perfect for large celebrations
venues.descriptionAr: قاعة أفراح فريدة وأنيقة مع ثريات فاخرة وديكور راقي، مثالية للاحتفالات الكبيرة

venues.name: Nasayem Layl Hall
venues.description: Elegant and classic wedding venue with beautiful kosha decorations, accommodating over 400 guests
venues.descriptionAr: قاعة أفراح أنيقة وكلاسيكية مع زينة كوشة جميلة، تتسع لأكثر من 400 ضيف

venues.name: Nassif House Museum
venues.description: Historic cultural center in Old Jeddah with 106 rooms featuring Ottoman Turkish architectural style, perfect for cultural events and exhibitions
venues.descriptionAr: مركز ثقافي تاريخي في جدة القديمة مع 106 غرفة بالطراز المعماري التركي العثماني، مثالي للأحداث الثقافية والمعارض

venues.name: Darat Safeya Binzagr
venues.description: Art gallery and cultural center showcasing Saudi and Hijazi heritage through art, featuring extensive research library
venues.descriptionAr: معرض فني ومركز ثقافي يعرض التراث السعودي والحجازي من خلال الفن، مع مكتبة بحثية واسعة

venues.name: Red Sea Mall Conference Center
venues.location: Red Sea Mall, Prince Abdulmajeed Street
venues.description: Modern conference facilities within Red Sea Mall, perfect for corporate events and business meetings
venues.descriptionAr: مرافق مؤتمرات حديثة داخل البحر الأحمر مول، مثالية للفعاليات المؤسسية والاجتماعات التجارية

venues.name: Stars Avenue Mall Event Space
venues.location: King Abdulaziz Road, Al Zahra District
venues.description: 4-story luxury mall with covered boulevard featuring facilities for weekend bazaars and special festivities
venues.descriptionAr: مول فاخر من 4 طوابق مع شارع مغطى يضم مرافق للبازارات الأسبوعية والفعاليات الخاصة

venues.name: Jeddah International Exhibition & Conference Center
venues.description: Largest corporate event venue in Saudi Arabia with 40,000 sq meters total area and 10,000 sq meters indoor event space
venues.descriptionAr: أكبر مكان للفعاليات المؤسسية في السعودية بمساحة إجمالية 40000 متر مربع و10000 متر مربع مساحة داخلية

venues.name: Shangri-La Jeddah
venues.description: Luxury hotel with 10 meeting rooms featuring latest AV technology and LED screens with bespoke event needs
venues.descriptionAr: فندق فاخر مع 10 غرف اجتماعات مع أحدث تقنيات الصوت والمرئيات وشاشات LED

venues.name: Rosewood Jeddah
venues.description: Ultra-luxury hotel with 8 exceptional meeting venues on the Corniche with refined design and elegant backdrop
venues.descriptionAr: فندق فاخر جداً مع 8 أماكن اجتماعات استثنائية على الكورنيش بتصميم راقي

venues.name: Assila, a Luxury Collection Hotel
venues.location: Prince Mohammed bin Abdulaziz Street (Tahlia Street)
venues.description: Five-star luxury hotel in Central Business District with meeting and event spaces, rooftop pool and spa
venues.descriptionAr: فندق خمس نجوم فاخر في منطقة الأعمال المركزية مع مساحات للاجتماعات والأحداث

venues.name: Movenpick Hotel Tahlia Jeddah
venues.description: 5-star luxury hotel with 7 meeting rooms for up to 150 guests, featuring modern technology
venues.descriptionAr: فندق 5 نجوم فاخر مع 7 غرف اجتماعات لما يصل إلى 150 ضيف مع تقنية حديثة

venues.name: Radisson Blu Hotel Jeddah Corniche
venues.description: 5-star hotel with 439 sq meters of meeting space, 150 elegant rooms, close to Red Sea Mall
venues.descriptionAr: فندق 5 نجوم مع 439 متر مربع من مساحة الاجتماعات، 150 غرفة أنيقة، قريب من مول البحر الأحمر

venues.name: Novotel Jeddah Tahlia Street
venues.description: 4-star hotel in the heart of Jeddah with variety of meeting rooms, rooftop pool and spa
venues.descriptionAr: فندق 4 نجوم في قلب جدة مع تنوع من غرف الاجتماعات ومسبح على السطح وسبا

venues.name: Vivid Jeddah Hotel
venues.description: Modern hotel with 339 rooms and 4 spacious meeting rooms with cutting-edge technology
venues.descriptionAr: فندق حديث مع 339 غرفة و4 غرف اجتماعات واسعة مع تقنية متطورة

venues.name: Lou'Lou'a Hall
venues.description: Modern wedding hall with Oriental cuisine, accommodating up to 500 guests with elegant ambiance
venues.descriptionAr: قاعة أفراح حديثة مع مطبخ شرقي، تتسع لـ500 ضيف مع أجواء أنيقة

venues.name: Palazzo Ballroom
venues.description: Elegant ballroom with refined atmosphere, perfect wedding execution guarantee
venues.descriptionAr: قاعة رقص أنيقة مع أجواء راقية، ضمان تنفيذ مثالي للأفراح

venues.name: Golden Rose Wedding Hall
venues.description: Luxurious wedding hall with golden theme decor and crystal lighting
venues.descriptionAr: قاعة أفراح فاخرة بديكور ذهبي وإضاءة كريستالية

venues.name: Al Jawhara Palace
venues.description: Palace-style wedding venue with traditional Saudi architecture and modern amenities
venues.descriptionAr: قاعة أفراح بطراز القصر مع العمارة السعودية التقليدية والمرافق الحديثة

venues.name: Crystal Dreams Hall
venues.description: Modern wedding hall with crystal theme and LED lighting system
venues.descriptionAr: قاعة أفراح حديثة بطابع الكريستال ونظام إضاءة LED

venues.name: Sunset Jeddah Business Center
venues.nameAr: مركز الأعمال فندق صن ست جدة
venues.description: Contemporary business center with 30,913 sq ft of meeting space in the heart of the city
venues.descriptionAr: مركز أعمال معاصر مع 30913 قدم مربع من مساحة الاجتماعات في قلب المدينة

venues.name: Jeddah Chamber of Commerce
venues.description: Premier business venue with multiple conference halls and exhibition spaces
venues.descriptionAr: مكان أعمال رائد مع قاعات مؤتمرات متعددة ومساحات معارض

venues.name: World Trade Center Jeddah
venues.description: International business center with world-class facilities for conferences and exhibitions
venues.descriptionAr: مركز أعمال دولي مع مرافق عالمية المستوى للمؤتمرات والمعارض

venues.name: King Fahad Cultural Center
venues.description: Major cultural venue with theater, exhibition halls, and conference facilities
venues.descriptionAr: مكان ثقافي رئيسي مع مسرح وقاعات معارض ومرافق مؤتمرات

venues.name: Al Balad Arts Center
venues.description: Historic arts center in Old Jeddah promoting traditional and contemporary arts
venues.descriptionAr: مركز فنون تاريخي في جدة القديمة يروج للفنون التقليدية والمعاصرة

venues.name: Jeddah Youth Center
venues.description: Modern youth center with sports facilities and event halls for community gatherings
venues.descriptionAr: مركز شباب حديث مع مرافق رياضية وقاعات فعاليات للتجمعات المجتمعية

venues.name: Al Nakheel Restaurant & Events
venues.description: Upscale restaurant with private dining rooms and event spaces for corporate gatherings
venues.descriptionAr: مطعم راقي مع غرف طعام خاصة ومساحات فعاليات للتجمعات المؤسسية

venues.name: Fakieh Aquarium Event Space
venues.description: Unique venue inside the aquarium for special events and private parties
